sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-onduty', templateUrl: './onduty.page.html', styleUrls: ['./onduty.page.scss'], standalone:false }) export class OndutyPage implements OnInit { formData = { name: '', nameSecond: '', date: '', destination: '', personToMeet: '', contactNumber: '', instructedBy: '', expectedTime: '', startTime: '', endTime: '', destinationType: '', officeDestination: '', nightDuty: '', purposeToVisit: '', approverName: 'CHETTIAPPAN .V', }; hours: string[] = []; minutes: string[] = []; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { // Generate hours (00-23) for (let i = 0; i < 24; i++) { this.hours.push(i.toString().padStart(2, '0')); } // Generate minutes (00-59) for (let i = 0; i < 60; i++) { this.minutes.push(i.toString().padStart(2, '0')); } } onSubmit() { console.log('Form Data:', this.formData); // Handle form submission here } }
Onduty Onduty Application
Employee Code Name Date Destination Person to Meet Contact Number Instructed By Expected Time Start Time End Time Type of Destination Office Other Destination (If Office) Madurai Egmore Whites Road Night Duty Yes No Purpose to Visit Approver Name Submit
